#summary The companyValue entity

[companyValue] entities are second class entities that occur in the COMPANYVALUES key of [Contact] and [Enterprise] entities.

= Example =

{{{
{'attribute': 'accepts_email',
 'companyObjectId': 10120,
 'entityName': 'companyValue',
 'label': 'E-Mail Solicitation',
 'objectId': 121290,
 'type': 2,
 'uid': '',
 'value': 'YES'}
}}}
